titles.title: Community Development Financing Act of 2010
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the treatment of municipal bonds guaranteed by Federal home loan banks as tax exempt bonds.
Community Development Financing Act of 2010

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Community Development Financing Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the tax-exemption of interest on state or local bonds guaranteed by a federal home loan bank on or after July 30, 2008.
